meanings.sent1: The shirted man looked neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: She always felt comfortable in her shirted attire.
meanings.sent3: The shirted cat strutted around like a little fashion model.
meanings.sent4: The shirted trees swayed gently in the breeze, their leaves rustling softly.
meanings.sent5: The bright red shirted flowers stood out against the green grass.

meanings.sent1: The shirted tablecloth was neatly pressed for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: The shirted bedspread added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The shirted car gleamed in the sunlight, looking almost brand new.
meanings.sent4: The shirted walls of the house were a calming shade of blue.
meanings.sent5: The shirted book cover protected the novel from dust and damage.
